p: These results demonstrate that a wide range of respiratory pathogens are circulating in Beijing city and that H3N2, H1N1, B-Yamagata, B-Victoria, hRV and MP are the major pathogens. It is recommended that the trend of pathogen spectrum changes in patients with ILI in the region should be continuously monitored. At the same time, the health department should also strengthen the analysis and utilization of monitoring data and track the activity level and variation in influenza virus rates to address fever outbreaks in a timely manner.
